original_text: So she set out and went and gleaned in the field after the reapers, and she happened to come to the part of the field belonging to Boaz, who was of the clan of Elimelech.
korean_text: 룻이 가서 베는 자를 따라 밭에서 이삭을 줍는데 우연히 엘리멜렉의 친족 보아스에게 속한 밭에 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: So she set out and went
and gleaned in the field after the reapers
sentences.korean_translation: 베는 자들 뒤에서 밭에서 이삭을 줍었고

sentences.original_text: to the part of the field belonging to Boaz
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 보아스에게 속한 밭의 한 부분이었고

sentences.original_text: who was of the clan of Elimelech.
